jsonBody.data: {"inf":"POL01","c_id":721983,"cseq":3,"h_id":7451728,"type":"C","valid":"Y","caseno":3597035492,"listno":"3rd","def_age":41,"def_dob":"12-05-1979","def_sex":"F","def_addr":{"line1":43,"line2":"Hunterfly Place","line3":"Birmingham"},"def_name":"Guadalupe Hess","def_type":"P","offences":{"offence":[{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.","sum":"On 05/09/2016 at Liverpool attempted to steal GAMES CONSOLES to the value of 750.00, belonging to Weiss Madden.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Attempt theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.","sum":"On 24/03/2016 at Liverpool stole NINTENDO SWITCH to the value of 300.00, belonging to Whitfield Lawson.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"}]}}
